Date: Tuesday, 4/1/1983
Subject: Angel Avalos learns new position
Angel Avalos has made noteable progress
learning his new position, Centerfield.
I would rate his skills as "E" right now.

Regards,
Your scouting director



Date: Tuesday, 4/1/1983
Subject: Retirement
Dear Sir,
It's been a hard decision, but I think I will retire
after this season. It's time to let the youngsters
take my job.

Regards,
Rudy Plourde



Date: Thursday, 4/3/1983
Subject: John Duncan failed learning new position
John Duncan doesn't seem to make
any progress learning his new position, Catcher.
I would give up this experiment before his hitting suffers.

Regards,
Your scouting director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1983
Subject: Progress of Oswaldo Jimenez
Dear Sir,
Oswaldo Jimenez is hitting the ball well at AA Lake Minnetonka Vessels!
He has an AVG of .343, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director
